response.title: The Relentless Storm
response.lore: To those on the icy tundra, Volibear is the storm made flesh. He is the ancestral spirit of war and winter who leads from the front with his savage claws. Though his enemy, civilization, has encroached upon the wilderness, Volibear seeks to rip through the modern world and return it to the age of myth. He fights fiercely to protect his land, his tribe, and the remnants of his heritage, fearing that the Freljord — and the spirit of the bear — will be forgotten.

passive.name: The Relentless Storm
passive.description: Volibear gains attack speed with each attack, and eventually mauls his enemies with chain lightning.

Q.name: Thundering Smash
Q.description: Volibear gains speed towards enemies, stunning and damaging the first one he attacks.

W.name: Frenzied Maul
W.description: Volibear damages an enemy, applying on-hit effects and marking them. Casting this ability again on the same target deals bonus damage and heals Volibear.

E.name: Sky Splitter
E.description: Volibear summons a lightning bolt at a location, damaging and slowing enemies while granting Volibear a shield if he's inside the blast radius.

R.name: Stormbringer
R.description: Volibear leaps to a target location, slowing and damaging enemies beneath him while gaining bonus health. Enemy turrets near his landing location become temporarily disabled.

tips.playing_as: Use the speed from Thundering Smash to position for Sky Splitter or to chase down fleeing enemies. Stormbringer can be used to engage team fights and disable turrets, giving your team a powerful advantage.
tips.playing_against: Volibear's healing from Frenzied Maul is strongest when he's low on health. Avoid letting him reach his wounded prey. Watch out for his Stormbringer leap, as it can turn the tide of battle and disable turrets.
